title: Jesus the Divine Lobster Comments on Jordan Peterson's 12 Rules
description:
I've started reading "12 Rules for Life" and I've got some comments on lobsters and Jesus and the crushed of the earth who have no hope in this age. 

https://www.amazon.com/12-Rules-Life-Antidote-Chaos-ebook/dp/B01FPGY5T0 

My father's autobiography https://www.amazon.com/Chains-Grace-Stanley-Vander-Klay-ebook/dp/B0051AUE3M/ 

The Eulogy for my father https://youtu.be/A-xeZ0rQfi4?t=19m50s 

https://paulvanderklay.me/2013/03/09/eulogy-for-my-father-stan-vander-klay/ 

Eulogy for my Aunt Glenda https://youtu.be/0N5Qx6omp_s 

Sapiens on Amazon https://www.amazon.com/Summary-Sapiens-Brief-History-Humankind-ebook/dp/B0722HVKQR
